name: DICE PAIRS
description:
Hi everyone!
My name is Ikmal Said and this is my submission for the GMTK 2022 Game Jam with the theme "Roll of the Dice". I hope you will enjoy my game as much as I enjoy making it. Please don't hesitate to ask me any questions about my game. I do also welcome constructive feedbacks and suggestions to further improve my game.
Thank you and have a very nice day ahead.
